data.text:
@Kathy329 Wow. Guess they should have layered even more mitigation measures on -- double masking + social distancing.
That's a great reminder to assess each situation for risk.

@DickeyFuller No, two weeks in the ICU. Then several in rehab…. Double vaxxed and boosted. No 36 hour sore throats. Two members of our church died in one week…. Again both vaxxed and boosted. New strains are emerging that the vaccines are not effective against.

@akoons76 @DrLeanaWen @CDCgov Yes; it looks like there may be damage to your actual immune system that takes so long to resolve that re-infection often occurs before that 'healing' has occurred. It's horrifying. Nothing to get, but certainly nothing to get multiple times.

@DrLeanaWen @CDCgov You can get covid more than once. Damage is cumulative. 

Why have you given into this 'gotta die of something' mentality? I am truly disappointed. And puzzled.
@PeterHotez @omark6 @DrLeanaWen @CDCgov She does say that the 58% of children with antibodies are recovered. She has no idea how many of those children have long term damage.
@DrLeanaWen @CDCgov Where does it say that 58% of children recovered? You assume they are all recovered because they got sick?
@DrLeanaWen @CDCgov Ninety four percent of deaths from COVID-19 are in those with an underlying age-related chronic disease, mostly caused by excess body fat.
